title: Gotta love the chinese players
body:
[REMOVED x3 - NO NAMING AND SHAMING]

I gotta admit I was actually laughing at this one, his insults were pretty sub-par and only involved my mother. Also does anyone know what he was saying on the last one? He didn't seem to get that no one could understand him so his efforts to flame us were useless.

replies.body: Videos are now muted also? Cmon think about the reasons why naming and shaming is a thing - because heaps of people would start bs topics. But videos are just there to show what happened, it's hardly naming and shaming. Can't handle what happened in a game? Unlucky.
